pc_polar_circle.name: Above the Arctic Circle
pc_polar_circle.description: Complete excellent deliveries in this order and direction: Ivalo - Kiruna - Svolvær (requires Nordic Horizons DLC)

aca_pass_conditions.name: Advanced Student
aca_pass_conditions.description: Complete the pass conditions in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

it_visit_sardinia.name: All Around the Blue Island
it_visit_sardinia.description: Discover at least 2 Sardinian cities (requires Italia DLC)

fr_visit_corsica.name: All Around the Isle of Beauty
fr_visit_corsica.description: Discover at least 4 Corsican cities (requires Vive la France ! DLC)
fr_visit_corsica.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Vive la France !

gr_hotels.name: All Inclusive
gr_hotels.description: Deliver cargo to at least 4 unique hotels in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

jobs_30_cargo.name: All Is Possible
jobs_30_cargo.description: Take and complete jobs with at least 30 different cargo

be_black_sea.name: Along the Black Sea
be_black_sea.description: Complete excellent deliveries between these coastal cities: Istanbul-Burgas, Burgas-Varna, Varna-Mangalia, MangaliaConstanța. Any order or direction counts (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
be_black_sea.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Road to the Black Sea

sc_oresund_bridge.name: Aquaphobia
sc_oresund_bridge.description: Travel across the Øresund Bridge between Copenhagen and Malmö (requires Scandinavia DLC)

maxed_male_female.name: Aspects of Professionalism
maxed_male_female.description: Have at least 10 female and 10 male employees of maximum level in your company

be_visit_cities.name: Balkan Explorer
be_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 20 Road to the Black Sea DLC cities (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
be_visit_cities.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Road to the Black Sea

ba_visit_cities.name: Baltic Tourist
ba_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 20 Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC cities (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)
ba_visit_cities.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Beyond the Baltic Sea

st_cat_785c.name: Big Brother
st_cat_785c.description: Complete delivery of the Haul Truck Chassis (requires Special Transport DLC)

fr_visit_cities.name: Bon Voyage!
fr_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 20 French cities (requires Vive la France ! DLC)
fr_visit_cities.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Vive la France !

it_shipyards.name: Captain
it_shipyards.description: Deliver cargo to at least 1 Italian shipyard (requires Italia DLC)

5_jobs_in_a_row.name: Careerist
5_jobs_in_a_row.description: Complete 5 jobs in a row - in-time, without taking any damage to cargo and without using autoparking

sc_cows_to_farm.name: Cattle Drive
sc_cows_to_farm.description: Complete a cattle delivery to any company in Scandinavia DLC (requires Scandinavia DLC)

fr_airports.name: Check-in, Check-out
fr_airports.description: Deliver cargo to at least 3 cargo airport terminals in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)
fr_airports.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Vive la France !

use_train.name: Choo-Choo
use_train.description: Use the train to cross the channel

ba_concrete.name: Concrete Jungle
ba_concrete.description: Complete 10 deliveries from concrete plants (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)
ba_concrete.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Beyond the Baltic Sea

ib_visit_cities.name: Conquistador
ib_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 30 cities in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

aca_truck_driving.name: Dedicated Student
aca_truck_driving.description: Complete at least 28 scenarios in Truck Driving Basics including the final exams (Driving Academy)

st_all_routes.name: Driver Exceptionnel
st_all_routes.description: Complete deliveries on at least 10 oversize routes in base game (requires Special Transport DLC)

ba_to_russia.name: Exclave Transit
ba_to_russia.description: Complete 5 deliveries from Kaliningrad to any other Russian city (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)
ba_to_russia.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Beyond the Baltic Sea

job_all_trailer_types.name: Experience Beats All!
job_all_trailer_types.description: Complete deliveries with following trailer types: Machinery, ADR cargo, Container, Refrigerated, Liquid cargo, Fragile cargo, Construction, Bulk cargo

aca_consecutive.name: Failure Is Not an Option
aca_consecutive.description: Complete any 5 scenarios in a row without failure from the third or fourth chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

be_blke_ferry.name: Ferryman
be_blke_ferry.description: Use a river ferry (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
be_blke_ferry.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Road to the Black Sea

ib_shipyards.name: Fleet Builder
ib_shipyards.description: Deliver cargo to at least 3 shipyards in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

use_automatic_parking.name: Friends Are Always Here to Help You

buy_truck_online.name: From the Comfort of Your Home

fr_truckstop.name: Gas Must Flow!
fr_truckstop.description: Deliver diesel, LPG or petrol to at least 3 truck stops in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)
fr_truckstop.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Vive la France !

aca_first.name: Get the Ball Rollin'
aca_first.description: Complete the first scenario of the first chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

st_silo.name: Giant
st_silo.description: Complete delivery of the Silo cargo (requires Special Transport DLC)

gr_olive.name: Gift of Athena
gr_olive.description: Deliver olives or olive oil from Eliarchos Olive Farm to 5 different cities in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

fr_nucplants.name: Go Nuclear!
fr_nucplants.description: Deliver cargo to at least 3 nuclear plants in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)
fr_nucplants.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Vive la France !

bw_ore_caravans.name: Going Camping
bw_ore_caravans.description: Deliver the following cargoes from companies in West Balkans to complete a production chain in this order: Ore, Aluminium Ingots, Electrical Wiring, Electronics, Campervans (requires West Balkans DLC)

bw_cutscenes.name: Grand Adventurer
bw_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in West Balkans (requires West Balkans DLC)

ba_job_countries.name: Grand Tour
ba_job_countries.description: Complete excellent deliveries between the following countries: Russia - Lithuania; Lithuania - Latvia; Latvia - Estonia; Estonia - Russia; Russia - Finland. Any order or direction counts (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)
ba_job_countries.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Beyond the Baltic Sea

ib_cutscenes.name: Grand Tour Guide
ib_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 12 viewpoints in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

bw_coastline.name: Holiday Coastline
bw_coastline.description: Complete 3 deliveries along the coast in this order: Rijeka - Zadar - Split - Niksic (requires West Balkans DLC)

quick_travel_to_hq.name: Honey, I'm Home
quick_travel_to_hq.description: Use quick travel to return to your headquarters

map_discover_60.name: I Am a GPS
map_discover_60.description: Discover at least 20,000 kilometers of roads

hc_allcargos.name: I Thought This Should Be Heavy?!
hc_allcargos.description: Complete a delivery of at least 8 unique cargoes from the Heavy Cargo Pack (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_allcargos.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Heavy Cargo Pack

ib_a_coruna.name: Iberian Pilgrimage
ib_a_coruna.description: Complete a delivery from Lisbon, Seville, and Pamplona to A Coruña (requires Iberia DLC)

it_visit_cities.name: Imperator
it_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 15 Italian cities (requires Italia DLC)

ba_industry.name: Industry Standard
ba_industry.description: Make 2 deliveries to locomotive, furniture and paper mill factories (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)
ba_industry.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Beyond the Baltic Sea

perfect_delivery.name: Job Is Only Worth It If It's Done Well!
perfect_delivery.description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) for a job that is at least 1,000 km

job_urgent.name: Just in Time!
job_urgent.description: Take an urgent delivery for a minimum of 550 km and complete it with less than 30 minutes remaining

hc_threeperf.name: Keep Calm and Haul Heavy
hc_threeperf.description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) of 3 consecutive Heavy Cargo Pack jobs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_threeperf.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Heavy Cargo Pack

fr_landmarks.name: Landmark Tour
fr_landmarks.description: Discover following landmarks of France: Carcassonne, Brotonne bridge, Tiger tank, Peyrat-le-Château, Château de Ventadour, Château d'Ussé (requires Vive la France ! DLC)
fr_landmarks.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Vive la France !

ib_container_ports.name: Let's Get Shipping
ib_container_ports.description: Deliver cargo to at least 4 container ports in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

ba_farm.name: Like a Farmer
ba_farm.description: Deliver cargo to at least 4 farms in Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)
ba_farm.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Beyond the Baltic Sea

job_2000_km.name: Long Hauler
job_2000_km.description: Complete a delivery that was greater than 2,000 km

it_roads_to_rome.name: Many Roads Lead to Rome
it_roads_to_rome.description: Enter Rome from at least 3 corridors that lead to it (requires Italia DLC)

st_mass.name: Mass-to-don
st_mass.description: Deliver at least 195 tons of oversized cargo in just 3 consecutive deliveries (requires Special Transport DLC)

it_quarry.name: Michelangelo
it_quarry.description: Complete a delivery from Carrara quarry (requires Italia DLC)

it_volcanoes.name: Mind the Lava
it_volcanoes.description: Visit Etna and Vesuvius volcanoes (requires Italia DLC)

sc_quarries_cargo.name: Miner
sc_quarries_cargo.description: Complete delivery jobs to at least 3 quarries in Scandinavia DLC (requires Scandinavia DLC)

jobs_20k_xp.name: Minimaxer
jobs_20k_xp.description: Gain 20,000 XP for several consecutive jobs with the total distance below 10,000 km

metallic_multi_color_paint.name: My Precious
metallic_multi_color_paint.description: Design and apply to your truck a custom multi-color metallic paint

garages_in_hq_country.name: National Company
garages_in_hq_country.description: Own at least one largest garage in your headquarter country

aca_stars.name: Nerd of the Road
aca_stars.description: Obtain 3 stars in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

hc_250t5jobs.name: No Pain No Gain
hc_250t5jobs.description: Deliver total of 250 tons of cargo on 5 consecutive jobs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_250t5jobs.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Heavy Cargo Pack

pc_cutscenes.name: Northern Secrets
pc_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 12 viewpoints of Nordic Horizons regions (requires Nordic Horizons DLC)

st_no_damage.name: Not a Big Problem
st_no_damage.description: Complete 3 consecutive oversize jobs without any damage (requires Special Transport DLC)

st_pilot_boat.name: Not a Canoe
st_pilot_boat.description: Complete delivery of the Service Boat (requires Special Transport DLC)

gr_visit_cities.name: Odyssean Voyager
gr_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 12 cities in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

aca_no_forward.name: One-Shottin' It
aca_no_forward.description: Complete any scenario in fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics in one attempt without correcting by driving forward (Driving Academy)

be_express.name: Orient Express
be_express.description: Complete deliveries between following cities, in this order and direction: Paris-Strasbourg, Strasbourg-Munich, Munich-Vienna, Vienna-Budapest, Budapest-Bucharest, Bucharest-Istanbul (requires Road to the Black Sea and Going East DLCs)
be_express.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Road to the Black Sea

unload_difficulty.name: Parking Challenge
unload_difficulty.description: Complete 20 deliveries choosing the trailer delivery option which requires reversing

map_discover_100.name: Pathfinder
map_discover_100.description: Discover at least 40,000 kilometers of roads

productivity_all_garages.name: Performance Optimizer
productivity_all_garages.description: Achieve at least 75% of the average garage productivity for 10 large garages in your company

pc_visit_cities.name: Polar Explorer
pc_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 20 cities in Nordic Horizons (requires Nordic Horizons DLC)

aca_interior.name: Professional Driver
aca_interior.description: Complete at least 6 scenarios in the fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics while using only the interior camera (Driving Academy)

job_no_ferry.name: Profit Hunter
job_no_ferry.description: Complete a job worth over €130,000 and minimum 2,200 km

be_border_crossings.name: Ranger
be_border_crossings.description: Visit at least 4 border crossings between Romania, Bulgaria and Turkey (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
be_border_crossings.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Road to the Black Sea

job_15_companies.name: Reliable Contractor
job_15_companies.description: Perform jobs for at least 15 different companies in the game

bw_visit_cities.name: Road to the Adriatics
bw_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 20 cities in West Balkans (requires West Balkans DLC)

aca_manual_transmission.name: Rowing Through the Gears
aca_manual_transmission.description: Complete 20 scenarios in chapters two, three or four using manual transmission in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

sc_deliver_marinas.name: Sailor
sc_deliver_marinas.description: Deliver yachts to all Scandinavian marinas (requires Scandinavia and High Power Cargo Pack DLCs)

pc_salm_fillet.name: Salmon Run
pc_salm_fillet.description: Deliver 2 cargoes of Salmon Fillet from the city of Tromsø or Alta to 2 different countries (requires Nordic Horizons DLC)

sc_scania_cargo.name: Scania Trucks Lover
sc_scania_cargo.description: Deliver truck cargo from Scania factory (requires Scandinavia DLC)

aca_stars_consecutive.name: Shining Star
aca_stars_consecutive.description: Obtain 3 stars in any 3 scenarios played in a row in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

gr_cutscenes.name: Sights and Legends
gr_cutscenes.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

sc_visit_cities.name: Sightseer
sc_visit_cities.description: Discover at least 15 Scandinavia DLC cities (requires Scandinavia DLC)

st_first_cargo.name: Size Matters
st_first_cargo.description: Deliver first oversize cargo (requires Special Transport DLC)

use_all_ports.name: Successfully Docked
use_all_ports.description: Use at least 5 ports in the game (counts sea, river and train ports)

daily_profit.name: Swimming in Success
daily_profit.description: Reach an average daily profit of €450,000

be_landmarks.name: Taking the Scenic Route
be_landmarks.description: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)
be_landmarks.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Road to the Black Sea

ib_solar_power_plants.name: Taste the Sun
ib_solar_power_plants.description: Deliver ADR cargo to at least 2 solar power plants in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

gr_marble.name: Temple Worthy
gr_marble.description: Deliver 3 Marble Blocks and 3 undamaged Marble Slabs from Rock Eater Quarry in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

999_km_with_each_brand.name: Test Drive Limited
999_km_with_each_brand.description: Drive 999 km during jobs with each of at least 5 truck brands, only your owned trucks count

st_all_cargos.name: The Bigger the Better
st_all_cargos.description: Complete at least 10 unique deliveries of oversize cargoes (requires Special Transport DLC)

bw_pristina_bijelo_polje.name: Through the Serpentines
bw_pristina_bijelo_polje.description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) between Pristina and Bijelo Polje (requires West Balkans DLC)

hc_firstjob.name: Time for Big Hauling
hc_firstjob.description: Deliver first Heavy Cargo (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_firstjob.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Heavy Cargo Pack

it_garages.name: True Sicilian
it_garages.description: Own a garage in at least 2 Sicilian cities (requires Italia DLC)

be_istanbul_jobs.name: Turkish Delight
be_istanbul_jobs.description: Complete 3 deliveries from Istanbul which are at least 2,500 km long (requires Road to the Black Sea and Going East DLCs)
be_istanbul_jobs.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Road to the Black Sea

sc_volvo_cargo.name: Volvo Trucks Lover
sc_volvo_cargo.description: Deliver truck cargo from Volvo Trucks factory (requires Scandinavia DLC)

sc_container_ports.name: Whatever Floats Your Boat
sc_container_ports.description: Deliver cargo to at least 1 container port in Scandinavia DLC (requires Scandinavia DLC)

large_garage_productivity.name: Working with the Elite
large_garage_productivity.description: Achieve 100% of productivity for at least 5 large garages at the same time

hc_1000xps.name: You Bet I Can Park It!
hc_1000xps.description: Collect 1,000 XP from parking on Heavy Cargo Pack deliveries (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)
hc_1000xps.group: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Heavy Cargo Pack
